analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/14/0x7050f87ca2691761f996c5060530c38c2a1288fa.sol:
	Contract FixedSupplyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0x7050f87ca2691761f996c5060530c38c2a1288fa.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/14/0x7050f87ca2691761f996c5060530c38c2a1288fa.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/14/0x7050f87ca2691761f996c5060530c38c2a1288fa.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/14/0x7050f87ca2691761f996c5060530c38c2a1288fa.sol#83) is not in mixedCase
